name: The Denpa Men: They Came By Wave
name_original: The Denpa Men: They Came By Wave
description:
The Denpa Men: They Came By Wave is an arcade game developed by Genius Sonority. It was originally released in 2012. It was published by Genius Sonority. Most rawgers rated the game as "Meh".
You can play The Denpa Men: They Came By Wave on Nintendo 3DS.
It was scored by Hitoshi Sakimoto.
